name: Mini Maxxers
description:
A 4-player party fighting game in which dice determines your stats! Kind of. You get to assign the roll to one of six stats which will affect your success in the game.

Navigate the menus by moving your cursor with WASD or left joystick and click buttons by hovering over them and pressing right trigger or left mouse click.

Made in less than 50 hours for #GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Controls
GamepadKeyboard & MouseMovementLeft joystick
WASDLook in direction
Right joystick
MouseFireRight trigger
Left mouse button
Dispel / Reflect
BumpersRight mouse button
ConfirmA (south button)
